kw.name: Default Suite Setup
kw.doc: The keyword contains the Default Setup steps for running the Functional Tests

kw.name: Open Browser To Login Page
kw.doc: The keyword opens the login page and verify the login page is opened

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Login Page Should Be Open
kw.doc: The keyword verifies that login page is opened

kw.name: Location Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current URL contains ``expected``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Web Scraper Testing Ground'.

test.name: Invalid_Login_Scenario

kw.name: Given I enter invalid username and invalid password
kw.doc: The keyword enter an invalid username and an invalid password on the given input fields

kw.name: user "${INVALID_USERNAME}" logs in with password "${INVALID_PASSWORD}"
kw.doc: The keyword will fill the input text field with given username and password

kw.name: Input Username
kw.doc: The keyword will inpurt given username to inout field with id usr

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: The keyword will inpurt given password to input field with id pwd

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: When I submit credentials
kw.doc: The keyword will submit credentials to the controller

kw.name: Submit Credentials
kw.doc: The keyword will submit credentials to the controller by clicking the Login button

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then Welcome Page Should not Open
kw.doc: The keyword verifies that the welcome page is not opened

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes screenshot of the current page and embeds it into log file.

kw.msg: Location should have been 'http://testing-ground.scraping.pro/login?mode=welcome' but was 'http://testing-ground.scraping.pro/login?mode=login'.

kw.name: Should Not Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is true.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Web Scraper Testing Ground'.

kw.name: And verify that the user credentials were not sent
kw.doc: The keyword verifies that page contains text ACCESS DENIED and not contains any other values

kw.name: verify that the page does not contain
kw.doc: The keyword verifes that given element doent not contains given text

arguments.arg: Able to login page with invalid credentials

kw.name: Element Should Not Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` does not contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: verify that the page does not contain
kw.doc: The keyword verifes that given element doent not contains given text

arguments.arg: THE SESSION COOKIE IS MISSING OR HAS A WRONG VALUE!
User credentials were properly sent but the session cookie was not properly passed

kw.name: Element Should Not Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` does not contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element 'case_login' does not contain text 'THE SESSION COOKIE IS MISSING OR HAS A WRONG VALUE!'.

kw.name: verify that the page does not contain
kw.doc: The keyword verifes that given element doent not contains given text

arguments.arg: User credentials were properly sent but HTTP redirection was not processed

kw.name: Element Should Not Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` does not contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: verify that the page contain
kw.doc: The keyword verifes that given element contains given text

arguments.arg: Failed to login scenario with invalid credentials

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Go to the homepage
kw.doc: The keyword verifes that page is redirecting to home page whiel clicking on Go back button

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Login Page Should Be Open
kw.doc: The keyword verifies that login page is opened

kw.name: Location Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current URL contains ``expected``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Web Scraper Testing Ground'.

test.doc: The test to verify invalid login scenario. It will verify that page is showing error properly if the user enters invalid username and password

kw.name: Default Suite Teardown
kw.doc: The keyword contains the Default Teardown steps for the Functional Tests

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.doc: The keyword enter valid username and password on the given input fields

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: The keyword will submit credentials to the controller
